Bloomington.50th & France:
50th & France is a major commercial district located in and around the area of West 50th Street and France Avenue South in Edina and Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States.
50th & France includes over 175 upscale retailers and offices offering professional services. Shops include various apparel stores, craft stores, jewelers, restaurants, cafes, spas, salons, a multiplex art-house movie theater (Landmark Theatres Edina Cinema), and a large Lunds grocery store.
